message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?

Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the benefits it brings.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $125. This is my best offer within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal within your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $130. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
